CustomField.description: Check this box once you've finished configuring the Event and related records. This makes the Event visible via the Event url and on all public groups and lists. If unchecked, the Event is only accessible by the preview url.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box once you've finished configuring the Event and related records. This makes the Event visible via the Event url and on all public groups and lists. If unchecked, the Event is only accessible by the preview url.
CustomField.label: Publish
